<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Gourd Leshy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=280)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Gourd leshys are guardians of fields, gardens, and farms. Many villages benefit from the protection of a gourd leshy, even if they are unaware of it.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Leshy_GourdLeshy.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Gourd Leshy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=280)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 218</row>

**Perception** +5; low-light vision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Druidic](/Languages.aspx?ID=23), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294) (gourds only)

**Skills**
[Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Keepsake** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The leshy can store an item of light Bulk or less in its head, concealing it as [_nondetection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=209). If stored for 24 hours, the item benefits from [_mending_](/Spells.aspx?ID=189).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 20

**Verdant Burst** ([healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89)) When a gourd leshy dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from its body, restoring 1d8 Hit Points to each plant creature in a 30-foot emanation. This area is filled with gourds, becoming difficult terrain. If the terrain is not a viable environment for these gourds, they wither after 24 hours.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning plus ensnare

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
seed +9 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning plus ensnare

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 15
- **4th**
[Speak with Plants](/Spells.aspx?ID=294)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The gourd leshy transforms into a Small gourd-bearing plant. This ability otherwise uses the effects of [_tree shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=342).

**Ensnare**   When the gourd leshy damages a creature with a fist or seed Strike, vines lash out from the leshy (or seed) and wrap around the target’s limbs. The target must attempt a DC 17 Reflex save. On a failure, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 round; on a critical failure, the target is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) for 1 round and the penalty to Speed lasts for 1 minute.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-67" />
name: Gourd Leshy
